messages.message:
Infrastructure Engineer

Dear Brian, 

I hope you are having a great day! I wanted to contact you in regards to an Infrastructure Engineer position I have available in Phoenix, AZ. I looked at your profile and thought you would be a great fit, please give me a call at the office when you get a chance, 480-368-2480. Thank you


Infrastructure Engineer
In-depth knowledge/skills in mobile technologies and deployment practices; AirWatch Enterprise Mobile Management preferred
Support an enterprise Microsoft Exchange environment with 10k mailboxes
Support an Office365 hybrid environment
Support internal and external mail flow; Cisco IronPort preferred
Experience with archiving technologies such as Exchange Archiving and Enterprise Vault
PowerShell knowledge a must
Windows administration in an active directory environment a must
Linux server administration a nice to have
Supporting technologies preferred such as Microsoft SCOM and Microsoft DPM 
General understanding of FoIP, VoIP, and Video Conferencing a nice to have.

Mandatory:
Microsoft Exchange 2010+
Office365
Mobility MDM technologies (AirWatch preferred)
Enterprise Vault
PowerShell scripting

Andrew Hess
ahess@apexsystemsinc.com
Thank you for connecting! I don't have the skills :/

Systems Analyst

Dear Brian, 

I hope you are having a great day! I wanted to contact you in regards to a Senior Network Engineer position I have available in Phoenix, AZ. I looked at your profile and thought you would be a great fit, please give me a call at the office when you get a chance, 480-368-2480. Thank you

Systems Analyst/Integrator
Integrate continuous process improvement/refinement by utilizing and applying operational and performance-based analytics. Lead or participate in projects of varying scopes including planning, budgeting, scheduling, and execution. Lead or participate in developing, validating, and execution of all levels of testing. Provide procedural, technical, and developmental mentoring, and may provide work direction to less experienced staff.

Mandatory:
FTP protocols/technologies - FTPS, SFTP, PGP encryption- Supported and managed critical file transfers (exchanged files with banks/financial trading partners) - Programming: Java, .Net, operating system scripts, SQL- Experience working with multiple teams.

Desired:
Setting up and managing FTP sites in IIS (Internet Information Server), VShell- Supported centralized EDI file transfers and B2B/FTP transfers- Understands data security, privacy and controls related to B2B file transfers- EAI experience with TIBCO tools

Andrew Hess
ahess@apexsystemsinc.com

Systems Analyst

Dear Brian, 

I hope you are having a great day! I wanted to contact you in regards to a Systems Analyst position I have available in Phoenix, AZ. I looked at your profile and thought you would be a great fit, please give me a call at the office when you get a chance, 480-368-2480. Thank you

Systems Analyst/Integrator
Integrate continuous process improvement/refinement by utilizing and applying operational and performance-based analytics. Lead or participate in projects of varying scopes including planning, budgeting, scheduling, and execution. Lead or participate in developing, validating, and execution of all levels of testing. Provide procedural, technical, and developmental mentoring, and may provide work direction to less experienced staff.

Mandatory:
FTP protocols/technologies - FTPS, SFTP, PGP encryption- Supported and managed critical file transfers (exchanged files with banks/financial trading partners) - Programming: Java, .Net, operating system scripts, SQL- Experience working with multiple teams.

Desired:

Andrew Hess
ahess@apexsystemsinc.com
Thank you for thinking of me but I don't think I am qualified.
